title: 5Ksana_HandMade
author: 5Ksana_HandMade
content: Sculpture "Bitcoin Crown"My Bitcoin Crown is called freedom, a crown that seldom slaves enjoy. I think you deserves every crown.Dimension: diameter 12 cм ( 4,7 inch.)Material: physical coins (16 pcs.) of Bitcoin ( Denarium 2015).Auction! https://plebeian.market/auctions/TJZA https://i.imgur.com/ql68Ekw.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/EC1RigO.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/GuGwRc9.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/TMdU8cG.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/dzcBX9l.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/t6IEhNj.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/LD4UQnY.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/7wexP4S.jpeg5ksana https://twitter.com/5Ksana/status/1563892347842215937?s=20&t=itQlXGMx8KFbiDj3z6t-Xw

comments.author: 5Ksana_HandMade
comments.body: Buying artworks is the best gratitude to the artist for his work!Auction 24 hours  https://plebeian.market/auctions/TJZA

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Interesting piece.  I like seeing what artists turn other artists' work into.  I like that it stands up on it's own too.  I could see this being a good conversation piece for someone's desk or a mantle display piece.  Could you imagine if someone did this with Casascius coins?  Might be an expensive but pretty awesome piece (using the blanks of course).  Good luck with your auction and future endeavors.

comments.author: 5Ksana_HandMade
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on September 01, 2022, 06:34:27 PMInteresting piece.  I like seeing what artists turn other artists' work into.  I like that it stands up on it's own too.  I could see this being a good conversation piece for someone's desk or a mantle display piece.  Could you imagine if someone did this with Casascius coins?  Might be an expensive but pretty awesome piece (using the blanks of course).  Good luck with your auction and future endeavors.  Thanks for support!
